version.name: Wipeout Season 3
version.short-description: Twenty-four participants will compete in the worlds largest extreme obstacle course to win US$50,000...
version.description: Twenty-four participants will compete in the world's largest extreme obstacle course to win US$50,000. New obstacles for this season include Fence Flappers, Foam-Covered, Shake-o-lator and Shape-Shifter.

version.name: Ben 10: Ultimate Alien
version.short-description: Follow Ben Tennysons evolution from a ten-year-old boy to a galaxy saving superhero.
version.description: Follow Ben Tennyson's evolution from a ten-year-old boy to a galaxy saving superhero. His secret identity has been revealed and he is now loved by kids all over the world. Watch Ben transform into ultimate versions of his aliens with his new mysterious Ultimatrix.

version.name: Wall-E
version.short-description: Wall-E discovers a new purpose in life when he meets a sleek search robot named EVE....
version.description: Wall-E discovers a new purpose in life when he meets a sleek search robot named EVE. EVE notices that Wall-E has found the key to the planet's future and races back to space to report her findings to the humans.

version.short-description: Mike Rowe brings viewers closer to the unsung American labourers who make their living in the most unthinkable ways...
version.description: Mike Rowe brings viewers closer to the unsung American labourers who make their living in the most unthinkable ways. Watch these people overcome fear, danger and sometimes stench to accomplish their tasks.

version.description: Join Adrian Richardson in this (mouth-watering) programme as he teaches you all the secrets to creating that perfect steak.

version.description: You've seen Chef Bruce in Philippines on the show 'Tablescapes' but this time, he will be creating more exquisite Filipino cuisines in his own private studio-kitchen.

version.short-description: After an altercation inside the cell block, an inmate collapses and dies from multiple stab wounds....
version.description: After an altercation inside the cell block, an inmate collapses and dies from multiple stab wounds. Special Agents John Fisher and Joe England collect forensic evidence to solve the case.

version.description: This adventure-thriller tells the story of Ibn Fahdlan (Antonio Banderas), an important emissary who is banished from his homeland. He must conquer his personal fears and help battle the illusive invaders of the night.

version.description: Husband and wife Dave and Caroline open their vegan restaurant, ZenKitchen, in the busy streets of Chinatown in Ottawa but will they be able to pull through the woes of a malfunctioning kitchen and inexperienced staff?

version.description: A night of mystique with Fire Dance, Cleopatra and Slave Show, Aerial Fire Performance, Snake Charmer Stunt and performance by The Opera Cirque Nouveau.

version.name: Ashore
version.short-description: Yong Look Lams sixth solo show, Ashore, reveals the painterly brilliance of watercolor techniques and sensuousness...
version.description: Yong Look Lam's sixth solo show, Ashore, reveals the painterly brilliance of watercolor techniques and sensuousness. In this series Yong explores Malaysian culture and traditions through the depiction of fishing boats, rural life, local flora and fauna and other indigenous aesthetics. His elegant composition and multifaceted design brings charm to community life while keeping the watercolor tradition alive and reputable.

version.name: Kuala Lumpur Children Book Fair 2010
version.short-description: There will be lots of fun activities for kids out there - Petrosains Mini Discovery Centre, animal-petting session, stage events and even competitions....
version.description:
The Kuala Lumpur Children's Book Fair (KLCBF) 2010 is a focused and themed book fair that aims to promote the wonderful world of children literature. Taking after the very successful KLIBF, KLCBF incorporates additional elements besides consumer product exhibition.

There will be lots of fun activities for kids out there - Petrosains Mini Discovery Centre, animal-petting session, stage events and even competitions. So parents, don't miss out on a chance to bring joy to your kids!

version.name: In Heat (Autumn Club) - October
version.short-description: Sizzling hip hop and R&B beats with TJ da DJ and Mr Morelli will raise temperatures even further...
version.description: Sizzling hip hop and R&B beats with TJ da DJ and Mr Morelli will raise temperatures even further.

version.name: Winter Chill Ladies - October
version.short-description: Guys, you won't find a cooler place in town to check out the babes on ladies night...
version.description: Ladies, don those suede boots and fur-trimmed coats and head down to Quattro this Wednesday just to chill out. Literally. Guys, you won't find a cooler place in town to check out the babes... trust us. Bring your jackets.

version.name: Neubeats - October
version.short-description: Featuring DJ Goldilocks and Miss Eva T. Ladies get free entry and three free drinks before midnight....
version.description: Neubeats is all about music, fashion and people. Expect to hear the latest R&B, pop, house, electro, rock all fused up in one single night. Party with DJs Goldilocks and the sexy Miss Eva T.

version.name: BLOW @ Mist Club
version.short-description: Slip on to the dance floor and go on and on with DVJs A-Rox and MC Fendi....
version.description: Slip on to the dance floor and go on and on with DVJs A-Rox and MC Fendi. Gents RM35 inclusive of one drink, Ladies free & free flow of house pouring until midnight.

version.name: The House of Exorcism
version.short-description: Be prepared for a whole know frightening-experience where four nights of terror will call out all you Edward & Jacobwannabies...
version.description:
It's the time of the year again where pumpkins go under the knife in numbers. Be prepared for a whole know frightening-experience where four nights of terror will call out all you Edward & Jacob-wannabies and dancing trolls to be gathered for the freaky festivities happening at Mist Club. Why trick or treat when you can unleash that crazy imagination of yours and exorcise your inner party demons! Now go howl at the moon.

Blow your Brains Off
Oct 27, Men RM35 inclusive of one drink. Free for ladies.
- Worms crawling out from their rotting bodies, you girls better be holding a chainsaw to hack them to pieces. They cant dance but they sure can thrill your night with your favorite zombie A-ROX!

LADIES NIGHT NeuMoon
Oct 28, Men RM25, Ladies RM20 inclusive of one drink.
- There are not many Edwards out there to save you so be careful not to shed a single drop of blood of you'll have 'them' running after you. Free drinks to anyone dressed as a vampire.

LADIES NIGHT LolliGore
Oct 29, Men RM40, Ladies RM30 inclusive of one drink.
- A prom night not for the faint-hearted so be prepared as there is no such thing as too much blood. With psychopath students and Tokyo-Gore-Lollitas, there will be BLOOD on the dance floor!

LADIES NIGHT Volume Scream Fest
Oct 30, Men RM40, Ladies RM30 inclusive of one drink.
- Games and creepy-crawly things are going to make you scream and you just might win yourself some great prizes for screaming the loudest!

- Compiled by Amin Khairuddin

version.name: Tribal BellyDance Festival Malaysia 2010
version.short-description: This is the first tribal bellydance festival to be held in Malaysia, and its not just limited to the belly dance you see in restaurants....
version.description:
This is the first tribal bellydance festival to be held in Malaysia, and it's not just limited to the belly dance you see in restaurants. There'll be Gothic, folkloric, tribal fusion and American tribal styles of belly dance. It's a gathering of over 30 instructors, 100 performers and of course you, Joe public. If you can't go somewhere without buying something, worry not, there will be stalls fringing the festival selling dancewear, 'alternative lifestyle items' (intriguing…) and even dispensing henna tattoos.

Why should you go to this festival?
Festival organiser Aiza Abni Habban (and award-winning belly dancer) says, 'You get to rub shoulders with all the pretty ladies, watch all the wonderful performances, be part of the tribe and most importantly, get to know us dancers! This is our life!'

version.name: Speedzone Tour 2010
version.short-description: In conjuction with Moto Garnd Prix, the best dance party Speedzone Tour 2010 is back...
version.description:
In conjuction with Moto Garnd Prix, the best dance party Speedzone Tour 2010 is back! The electrifying event will start with the world-renowned Mauro Picotto who has released over 600 productions and numerous remixes. Lange, the influential dance artist will be also make an appearance. Also not forgetting our very own, Goldfish & Blink as well as Terence C will be mixing it all up!

Date : 9th Oct 2010
Time : 7pm onwards
Venue: KL Live

Ticketing/Bookings : Axcess

version.name: Medea @ The Actors Studio
version.short-description: Watch this brilliant performance to find out the truth behind it....
version.description:
Love and revenge, Medea was left by her husband, hurt she killed the woman who stole him away. Is this life? Does love leads to revenge? Watch this brilliant performance to find out the truth behind it. Details below:

Date : 13th - 17th Oct, 2010
Time : 8.30pm (13, 14, 15, 16 Oct), 3pm (16, 17 Oct)
Venue: The Actors Studio, KL
Price: RM40

event.name: A Night of Cantonese Opera IV

version.name: A Night of Cantonese Opera IV
version.short-description: Cantonese opera exponent from Hong Kong, Madam Kam, will once again lead her talented group of local performers in this special edition...
version.description:
The Actors Studio through its Teater Rayat programme will be attempting to revive the glorious days of Cantonese Opera with an on-going series. The huge success of the very first installment in 2009 paved the way for the second, third, and now fourth installment this October.

Cantonese opera exponent from Hong Kong, Madam Kam, will once again lead her talented group of local performers in this special edition held in conjunction with The Actors Studio @ Lot 10's first birthday. A Night of Cantonese Opera IV will feature eight delightful pieces spread  across two sets.

Date : 7 - 8 Oct (Set 1); 9 Oct (Set 2)
Time : Set 1 8pm, Set 2 3pm & 7pm
Venue: The Actors Studio @ Lot 10

version.name: Medea
version.short-description: A Greek play that has been adapted and presented in the form of a traditional Malay performance...
version.description:
The Actors Studio Teater Rakyat will be staging Medea, a Greek play that has been adapted and presented in the form of a traditional Malay performance. Medea will be directed by renowned director Norzizi Zulkifli and stars a stellar cast comprising veteran names.

Greek theatre is well-known for the use of its chorus as commentators or spectators. This time round, the chorus will be fused with a dikir barat performance. Gamelan will also be featured as part of the show.

The play will be performed in BM with English surtitle.

Medea is the story of the dutiful and loyal wife to Jason, whom she loved with all her heart. Their marriage bore them two princes. However her sacrifice and love was met by betrayal. Lured by the promise of rank and wealth, her husband left her for another woman. Outraged, Medea plots to kill the woman who ruined her marriage and then end her life. Who is at fault really?
version.price: RM25 (preview night); RM40 / RM25 (students & the disabled)

version.name: RAINBOW MASSACRE 2010: We Are Family!
version.short-description: Whether youre bent, straight or zigzag, somewhere out there is a queer anthem just for you....
version.description:
Whether you're bent, straight or zigzag, somewhere out there is a queer anthem just for you. From Kylie to Siti, from Bowie to Ah Mei, queer icons give us the soundtrack to dance to our tears, fight back the haters, and unleash our true fabulous selves in all the pretty colours of the rainbow. Their songs unite us in a worldwide group hug of every brand of love, from dazzling to nasty to just plain mushy.

Date : 15th - 17th Oct 2010
Time : 8.30pm
Venue: Annexe Gallery

version.name: HOWL-O-WEEN : Full Throttle
version.short-description: The HOWL-O-WEEN: Full Throttle is definitely THE way to start your night during this spooky month!.....
version.description:
Trick or treat! Well, not really. But guess what? Ministry of Sound - Euphoria is having a string of parties. The HOWL-O-WEEN: Full Throttle is definitely THE way to start your night during this spooky month! Details below:

Wed, 27th October (Theme: Paranormal Activity)
Gents - RM25 + 1 drink, Ladies - Free entry all night + 1 drink before midnight, Free entry for first 100 guests dressed in costume according to the theme of the night
Bottle Promo: Before 11.30pm - RM299nett for 1 bottle & RM499nett for 2 bottles, After 11.30pm - RM388nett for 1 bottle & RM588nett for 2 bottles
(Bottle choices: Chivas Regal 12 Yrs, Absolut Vodka Blue, Havana Rum, Beefeater Gin, Olmeca Tequila)


Thurs, 28th October (Theme: House of Asian Horrors)
Gents - RM40 + 1 drink, Ladies - Free entry + 1 drink all night (Ladies Night), Free entry for first 100 guests dressed in costume according to the theme of the night
Bottle Promo: Before 11.30pm - RM299nett for 1 bottle & RM499nett for 2 bottles, After 11.30pm - RM388nett for 1 bottle & RM588nett for 2 bottles
(Bottle choices: Chivas Regal 12 Yrs, Absolut Vodka Blue, Havana Rum, Beefeater Gin, Olmeca Tequila)


Fri, 29th October (Theme: Jason vs Vampires)
Gents - RM35 + 1 drink, Ladies - Free entry before midnight, RM25 + 1 drink after midnight, Free entry for first 100 guests dressed in costume according to the theme of the night
Bottle Promo: Before 11.30pm - RM299nett for 1 bottle & RM499nett for 2 bottles, After 11.30pm - RM388nett for 1 bottle & RM588nett for 2 bottles
(Bottle choices: Chivas Regal 12 Yrs, Absolut Vodka Blue, Havana Rum, Beefeater Gin, Olmeca Tequila)


Ministry of Sound - EUPHORIA 2nd Anniversary Party
Sat, 30th October (Theme: Terror within the cave)
Gents - RM45 + free flow before 11.30pm, RM45 + 1 drink after 11.30pm, Ladies - RM35 + free flow before 11.30pm, RM35 + 1 drink after 11.30pm
Bottle Promo: Before 11.30pm - RM299nett for 1 bottle & RM499nett for 2 bottles, After 11.30pm - RM388nett for 1 bottle & RM588nett for 2 bottles
(Bottle choices: Chivas Regal 12 Yrs, Absolut Vodka Blue, Havana Rum, Beefeater Gin, Olmeca Tequila)
Prizes: Most Creative & Scariest Costumes to win prizes worth up to RM15,000!

Admission is free.

version.name: Lobo Live In Malaysia 2010
version.short-description: As a part of his 'Lobo Asia Tour, Roland Kent Lavoie or better known as 'Lobo' is heading down to Malaysia....
version.description:
As a part of his 'Lobo Asia Tour, Roland Kent Lavoie or better known as 'Lobo' is heading down to Malaysia as one of his many Asian stops. Back in the 70s, this American singer-songwriter sang country tunes like 'Me and You and a Dog Named Boo', 'Dont Expect Me To Be Your Friend' and more. This will be his second visit to our beautiful country (first in 2006). catch him live at the Arena of Stars this 15th October, 8.30pm.

Ticketing info here

version.short-description: Jean-Yves Thibaudet returns with plenty of sweet music. Happening on the 30th - 31st of October at 8.30pm, don't miss out....

version.description: Malaysian pianist Foo Mei Yi and the MPO ensemble will present works of Ligeti, Ravel and Messiaen in the concert.

version.name: 'Psycho' with Orchestra!
version.short-description: Experience one of the most fabulous examples of menace in music as Kevin Field drives the MPO through Bernard Hermanns outstanding score for Hitchcocks 1960 horror film...
version.description: Experience one of the most fabulous examples of menace in music as Kevin Field drives the MPO through Bernard Hermann's outstanding score for Hitchcock's 1960 horror movie complete with its famous screeching violins. Hitchcock said that "33% of the effect of Psycho was in the music" and, with the movie screened as the MPO play, expect 100% thrills.

version.short-description: From the ancient Malay literature, Malim Deman tells a tale about Prince Raja Malim Dewa who rules the Muar city.....
version.description: From the ancient Malay literature, Malim Deman tells a tale about Prince Raja Malim Dewa who rules the Muar city. Seeking blessings from his mother, Tuan Puteri Lindungan Bulan, he hopes to find a suitable partner. A tear-jerker as a series of tragic events ensues involving Malim Deman.

version.description: Famed Canadian ensemble The Tafelmusik Baroque Orchestra performs works from Monteverdi, Vivaldi, Handel and Bach along with a poetic narration against a backdrop of images from the Hubble telescope.

version.name: Storytelling & Costumes Competition
version.short-description: Storytelling & Costumes Competition
version.description:
All the story tellers, bring you and your stories here!  In conjunction with the ongoing 'Treasury of the World: Jewelled Arts of India in the Age of the Mughals' exhibition, the Islamic Arts Museum Malaysia and MPH Bookstores have organised this interactive project. Find registration forms on the website. We are really looking forward to your different stories. Visit www.mphclick.com for more details.

Schedule: MPH Subang Parade, Oct 9;
                   MPH Megastore 1 Utama, Oct 16;
                   MPH Mid Valley, Oct 23, Oct 30, 2 - 4pm.

version.name: 9th Latin American Film Festival
version.short-description: To celebrate this wonderful event, mark your calendars because from the 14th - 17th October 2010....
version.description:
The 9th Latin American Film Festival is coming soon. To celebrate this wonderful event, mark your calendars because from the 14th - 17th October 2010, screenings of several popular Latin American films will be showcased here in GSC! For further details, please log in to www.latinfilmfest.org.my and www.gsc.com.my for time and date.

La cámara oscura (María Victoria Menis, 2009)
In the province of Entre Ríos, a woman who grows as an unattractive child becomes insignificant and almost transparent. She is ignored by others until a French photographer arrives and discovers her beauty.

Bossa Nova (Bruno Barreto, 2000)
A romantic comedy mixing personal stories with genuine Brazilian charm.  Mary Ann is a widow who has given up on love.  Pedro is the midst of a sticky divorce but when he sees Mary Ann, he is instantly smitten with her. Meanwhile, Mary Ann's student is having an affair and Pedro's brother falls in love with Pedro's intern.

La Anunciación (Pineda Barnet, 2009)
With effects and sound that play between drama and thriller, the feature film tells the story of Amalia, a high school teacher that turns to spiritualism in her old age, seeking harmony in her home environment.

El Regalo (Cristián Galaz & Andrea Ugalde, 2000)
This is the story of three friends, Francisco, Pacheco and Tito. Francisco, a widowed retiree, is going through a difficult time and, to cheer him up, Tito and Pacheco decide to give him a gift. They invite him on a trip to the Chillán hot springs, along with Lucy, Francisco's teenage sweetheart, who excitedly accepts their invitation. But things don't always go as planned.

Cuando me toque a mi (Victor Arregui, 2008)
A murder sets in motion a series of tragedies that find their way to the city morgue's brooding Dr. Arturo Fernandez. Isolated from the world around him, Arturo develops an intimate relationship with the personal lives of his cases, forcing him to confront his connection to the living and the dead.

El viaje de la Nonna (Sebastián Silva, 2008)
La Nonna forgets everything. But the one thing she won't forget is her last wish - to go to the village of Todaro, the birthplace of her deceased husband. She wants to take her entire family with her, but most of them don't want to go. But when La Nonna's insistence begins to verge on threats, her family decides to grant her this last wish.

La prueba (Judith Vélez, 2006)
Miranda needs to find her missing father, whose blood type can save her brother's life. Whilst searching for him, she recalls her teenage years and how her family began to collapse amidst a society hit by corruption and terrorism.  She undertakes an uncertain journey towards Siabayo, where she believes his father is staying.

El Baño del Papa (César Charlone & Enrique Fernández, 2009)
In Melo, several men earn their living from contraband, mostly transported on bicycles. One of them, Beto, is getting too old for heavy freights but hopes to earn a motorbike. The idea is to build and charge money for the use of a proper lavatory at the occasion of the first-ever papal visit to Uruguay, as His Holiness is expected to pass trough Melo.

Zamora, tierra y hombres libres (Román Chalbaud, 2009)
The movie explores the life of Ezequiel Zamora, one of the protagonists of the most violent period in the history of Venezuela.

Only available in GSC Pavilion KL, GSC 1 Utama, GSC Mid Valley

version.short-description: A platinum-selling and award-winning recording artiste, Sharizan steps into the limelight again with his album Timeless....

version.name: Margie Segers Live at NBT Album Launch
version.short-description: Margie Segers used to appear in Indonesias music scene as a blues, motown and soul singer but under the wing of Jack Lesmana...
version.description: Margie Segers used to appear in Indonesia's music scene as a blues, motown and soul singer but under the wing of Jack Lesmana, Margie emerged as an astounding jazz vocalist. Performing with her that night are Idang Rasjidi (piano), Ananda Mates (bass) and Lewis Pragasam (drums).

version.name: Michael Veerapen ft. Joanna Bessey
version.short-description: Pianist Michael Veerapen will be accompanied by the multi-talented Joanna Bessey..
version.description: Pianist Michael Veerapen will be accompanied by the multi-talented Joanna Bessey who just recently directed 'So You Think You Can Mamak?' and 'Wacky Bar' at PJ Live Arts (PJLA).

version.name: Anthony Strong
version.short-description: Twenty-five year old Anthony Strong is a London based singer-pianist who writes music infused with jazz, blues and soul....
version.description: Twenty-five year old Anthony Strong is a London based singer-pianist who writes music infused with jazz, blues and soul. You might hear some familiar tunes influenced by Frank Sinatra, Stevie Wonder, Burt Bacharach and Oscar Peterson during his performance.

version.name: Amir Yussof & Roots
version.short-description: Amir has just formed a band called Roots who play mostly rearranged original songs from Amirs albums...
version.description: Amir has just formed a band called Roots who play mostly rearranged original songs from Amir's albums. Watch him perform some relaxing tunes at NBT with his band.

version.name: Tim Wilson: Logic
version.short-description: An Australian-based saxophonist, woodwind instrumentalist and composer, Tim has performed and recorded with numerous artistes including Ray Charles...
version.description: An Australian-based saxophonist, woodwind instrumentalist and composer, Tim has performed and recorded with numerous artistes including Ray Charles, Olivia Newton-John, Hugh Jackman and Michael Buble. He will be performing with Glenn Cannon (guitar), Ben Vanderwal (drums) and Dane Alderson (bass) at NBT.

version.description: DJ Joe Black & Musta K shake it and break it.

version.name: Plucks Musical Arson
version.short-description: Plucks Musical Arson Pluck brings comedy and classical music together like no other group has, tapping into the international love for all things musical and comic...
version.description:
Pluck brings comedy and classical music together like no other group has, tapping into the international love for all things musical and comic. The classically trained trio were here in Malaysia for sell-out tours in 2004 and 2006, and are back with a slightly different line-up (two of the original three have been replaced) but no less humour.

Pluck's brand of string instrument silliness has taken the Edinburgh fringe festival more than once by storm, and racked up considerable awards for the group. The basic premise was hatched in 2002, when three classical musicians decided to bring an element of comedy to their shows. Eight years and four original shows later, violinist Kit Massey, violist Jon Regan and cellist Flora Allison put their considerable classical musical experience to good use by turning a previously stuffy genre into a free-for-all laugh fest.

In spite of their antics, or even because of them, the three are clearly very talented, and their use of stage gags and slapstick humour is endearing, rather than annoying. Plus they do turn some very impressive tricks - surely playing a violin is hard enough, without also dancing, running, and making silly faces at the same time.

And it's not only long-dead composers who come under the knife (or bow, as it were). All music is ripe for the parodying, with Abba classics and Hendrix tunes making it to the stage as well.

- Emma Chong

version.name: Art Expo Malaysia 2010
version.short-description: The International Art Expo Malaysia is where Art's at. Old and New, East and West. Whatever forms, whatever styles, whatever media...
version.description:
The International Art Expo Malaysia  is where Art's at. Old and New, East and West. Whatever forms, whatever styles, whatever media. Paintings, Sculptures, Prints, Assemblages, Installations, New Media (Digital Art). Astonishing artworks from all over the world - Asia, Europe - Eastern and Western, the United States, Central America.

Date : 28th Oct-1st Nov 2010
Venue: MATRADE Exhibition and Convention Centre

For further details, please email info@artexpomalaysia.com

version.name: International Art Expo Malaysia 2010
version.short-description: Art Expo Malaysia 2010 provides the opportunity for visitors to admire 2000 pieces of great artworks....
version.description:
Art Expo Malaysia 2010 provides the opportunity for visitors to admire 2000 pieces of great artworks (including paintings, sculptures, digital art, installation, photography and mural art) represented by more than 60 reputable art galleries from 20 countries at once, under one roof.

Part of the 1 Malaysia Contemporary Arts Tourism Festival.
http://www.timeoutkl.com/art/events/1-Malaysia-Contemporary-Arts-Tourism-Festival
